Wowhead
Wowhead

Ogre Thieves

Return Abercrombie's Crate to Abercrombie.
Abercrombie's Crate

Description

A few weeks ago I was picking herbs far from my house, and a band of ogres attacked me! I ran, and I was forced to leave behind a crate of precious tools and herbs.

After they chased me off, the ogres swaggered back to the ogre mound in southern Duskwood. I'm sure my crate is somewhere near the mound.

Please, <name>, retrieve this crate for me for I miss it sorely.

Progress

Do you have my crate? If so, then please...give it to me quickly!

Completion

Thank the Nec-...well, thank YOU, <name>! You have more than earned your reward.

Aha! Happy! Happy nights ahead!!

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 1200 Experience
